website_summaries.verdict: A basic yet handsome model that won't break your budget. A great choice if you're looking for a deal.
pros: Has a sturdy feel with a simple style that fits most bedrooms
cons: Some owners complain that the drawer doesn't open and close smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent wood finish otherwise good basic nightstand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for each of my two kids. These are good basic wooden nightstands with a small footprint and an affordable price. After we put the first one together, I was all set to give 5 stars BUT then we put the second one together and the drawer front is a completely different finish (see picture -- one drawer front has a nice wood grain, the other is just a plain no-grain veneer). They shipped at the same time from the same vendor. This doesn't effect their function at all and my 9 & 10 year olds don't seem to mind but if they were for use in my room, I'd return one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Look under poor screws
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's made mostly made out of wood. I was ready to return the table when the first two long screws stripped before I could tighten them. They had to be removed very carefully with pliers. The provided tool did not properly fit the hex headed screws and stripped very easily making them unusable. The door color did not match the rest of the table. When I get tired of looking at it I will paint the whole thing. I replaced the provided screws with pocket screws
customer_reviews.author: Jim Twin

customer_reviews.title: PARTS DON'T MATCH DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The replacement parts from the manufacturer also don't match the natural finish. Waste of money, don't buy the natural finish they look HORRIBLE. The drawer face and lower shelf DO NOT match the rest of the night stand! I contacted Winsome directly and they're shipping me out the "correct" ones, not sure why they're not in the original box. Looks TERRIBLE, I better not have to disassemble and return this. I will update my review when I get the replacements...
customer_reviews.author: joeofthedirt

customer_reviews.title: super pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: i'd been looking for a bedside table for a while but they can be pricey. i saw that amazon warehouse had one of these available ("used/like new") at a really good price so i jumped on it. but even if i had paid full price i would have still been very pleased. it's heavy (solid) and sturdy too. i love the natural finish because my color scheme is white and cream. and it fits perfectly in that spot. plus it came with 8 matching wood plugs that hide the screws (a wonderful touch for an elegant finish). looking at it you'd never think i was the one who put it together :D love love love!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ambience

customer_reviews.title: Lacking The Genuine Look and Quality
customer_reviews.text: The overall appearance of this table is fair. It was the perfect size to put my pedestal fan on. However, I was disappointed that what I received does not match the photo. The bottom shelf that I received has NO wood grain. Some of the pieces of wood used are warped. Therefore, the drawer doesn't close smoothly. Also, some of the screws will not tighten completely.
customer_reviews.author: James Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great table BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Ok, Let me start off by saying this table is very sturdy, Here are the reasons it for 4 stars instead of 5... 1. Instructions are not very clear. 2. The pieces are not labeled and neither is the hardware. 3. If you have any kind of problems with your hands, you will need someone to put this together for you, because a lot of the screws need a hex key instead of a flat head or a Philips screwdriver. The table is worth the money, I bought 2 of them for beside my bed, and they look good and they are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Value - materials of construction clarified here
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good value. I needed something temporary that wasn't a total piece of junk. I think these will fit the bill. There seems to be some contradictory reviews here on the materials of construction. Here's what I received: Made from *real* wood (appears solid, not plywood): table top, "frame", drawer pull, drawer sliders,screw cover thingys. Made from particle board: all other components except perhaps the drawer bottom. Made from "other" - drawer bottom. Hard to tell, could be heavy duty cardboard. Light duty use on this drawer! Equipped with a power drill and the two bits needed (phillips, 4mm), these can be assembled with ease in 20 minutes or perhaps less. Hope this helps in your purchasing decision :)
customer_reviews.author: ududidj

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like the picture🙁
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! As you can see by my Photo, my table looks very sad compared to the advertised picture. The bottom shelf & the drawer front are much lighter in color & have no grain to them. Also what should have been a very simple assembly was made hard by several predrilled holes not lining up correctly. If I had more energy I’d take it apart, dump it in the box & return it.
customer_reviews.author: lovetowalk

customer_reviews.title: SOME assembly requied?
customer_reviews.text: more like ALL assembly required. no tools given to use. price should be lower if customer has to do all the work. it did not fit together well, but i will keep it since i doi not want to take it apart to send it back not worth the $38
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Tioran

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So my husband and I wanted some night stands for our new bed and we purchased these. Honestly, it’s durable and very nice. They are much more spacious than the picture display. The drawer part is a little flimsy, however, it is expected with the cost. I tend to place my jewelery in the compartment. Nothing too heavy. Just to give you a image of what it’s capable of holding, currently I have a lamp, 8x10 picture, my cell phone. I still have space for miscellaneous items.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha George

customer_reviews.title: Nicer then I thought
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, had all necessary parts and even an allen wrench to assemble readily available. Am seriously considering getting a 2nd night stand from Winsome .Really appreciate finally getting some bang for the buck so to speak. The Oak finish and solid feel to this table for what they are really are worth the choice with them. Hopefully they will hold up with time. I really would recommend to any one looking for a modest night stand. Thank you to amazon/the shipper/Delivery personal job all around.good
customer_reviews.author: Ghostraven2016

customer_reviews.title: Key parts the draw are made from a dense particle board. Does screws will crack the board.....
customer_reviews.text: Unfortuately some key structural parts of the draw are made from a fine particle type board. It does not support screws. It will crack very easially rendering the screws to be of little value except to hold it together while glued together. the draw does not close without need for serious adjustment. I called the customer service of the manufactor and the voice mail was filled...xxxx. Get a price adjustment from Amazon or the vendor for the product and do some carpentry work and adjustments. It will add an hour to the assembly but finished if it holds up its is nice as it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: dmb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, wood spilting at pre-drilled holes, chunk of wood missing on side piece. Drawer has no guides, so drawer hangs down when open more than 6 inches. Much lighter in color than expected, more of a poplar or ash than an oak.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren1981

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking table, and the price is phenomenal. I would expect less at this price. As others have noted, if you want the drawer to be truly smooth, you'd need to attach a piece of wood underneath the top. I might do that one day, but it works as is. If you keep a lot of things in the drawer and need to pull it out all the way regularly, then it would be an issue. Still, you're getting a very nice looking, high quality night stand with shelf and drawer for $35 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: SerenePDX

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This had the potential to be a decent table but it has numerous flaws. The bottom shelf is poorly aligned making the bolts impossible to tighten with the provided allen wrench which stripped and became useless. Trying to assemble the drawer without any issues was a pipe dream. The parts did not line up properly and one of the side parts split to where it would not hold a screw. I could go on and on but the bottom line is that this is not a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: The size of the table is just right as a nightstand in a small room. I got the natural and love the color. It matches the maple in the rest of the room perfectly. It was relatively easy to assemble and the instructions were very clear. No missing parts! I did mess up and used the long screws in the wrong place so I made 4 bumps in the top but hammered them back down and you can barely notice. It's nice and sturdy and I love the simple design. It's not top of the line furniture but for the price, it's a great little table.
customer_reviews.author: CarolM

customer_reviews.title: missing necessary parts
customer_reviews.text: received this product with absolutely NO hardware to put it together. had to purchase replacement parts from the manufacturer after a but of begging since i didn’t qualify for free parts. table is a bit wobbly after assembly. when assembling the drawer the wood split from the screws, and the bottom part of thr drawer is basically cardboard. this has a lot of potential to be a good quality piece of furniture but unfortunately it falls a bit short. itll do for now but will become trash when we move agai .
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Useful little table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying the manufacturer's printer stand. I was impressed with the printer stand in value and construction and that made me look for their other products when it cam time to find something else for my office/work area. I use this table to put my tool case on. It is sturdy enough to hold up under that weight. The assembly was easy. I did take someone else's advice and apply a little wood glue to the joints to make sure it would hold up against what I was planning to do to it. It looks nice, is very sturdy and is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Nice good looking tables
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly,Easy to follow instructions Nice finish. The only problem was putting on the top wood screws they are short because of the top.DO NOT USE A DRILL FOR THE TOP SCREWS. Must put push down while turning in the screws and go slow and than they go in OK and hold or else it stripes. So I put a little super glue to hold them down for extra strength. For the price and look well worth it. I would buy them again if I needed more tables.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not easy
customer_reviews.text: All in all it's a simple heavy piece of furniture. However it was the single most difficult thing I've assembled and I've assembled alot. The predrilled holes were stripped the screw were either too long or too short. I ended up having to use glue and washers. I like it but am not sure how long it will last before I have to rebuild it. And in my set of directions the very first step left one guessing which screws to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you buy this, you'll need wood glue
customer_reviews.text: The table assembles easily; however, the pieces that aren't solid wood are poorly manufactured. The pieces made of particle board/composite wood have holes that aren't drilled properly so the screws won't stay in place. The particle board/composite holes crumble easily as well. Your best bet is to be prepared by having wood glue handy. I used it on all those pieces to insure it stays together. The solid wood pieces are great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: UNASSAMBLED AND MISSING PARTS.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time completely unassembled and missing 8 screws. One will need to verify missing parts before assembly as a trip to the hardware store and a power drill will be necessary. If it wasn't such a good value for a guest bedroom I would say NOT A GOOD BUY. Bee prepared to assemble and make a trip to hardware store. TYPICAL DON"T GIVE A S... QUALITY FROM A FOREIGN COUNTRY...Thialand. No, I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Picture DOES NOT show the actual product
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago I bought one of these for the guest bedroom and gave it 4 stars out of 5 because the picture DOES NOT SHOW THE ACTUAL PRODUCT: the drawer face and shelf were veneer, while the picture shows solid wood. But it was reasonably priced, assembled easily, arrived on time and came to my home in good condition. What I unwrapped and put together today also has a veneer top, while the picture clearly shows butcher block-type solid wood. Therefore, it doesn't match the other one. I'm disappointed but not very surprised to see you "cheaped out."
customer_reviews.author: J.Kirley

customer_reviews.title: For $30 it was "not bad"- not bad to put together and not bad looking
customer_reviews.text: This is awful. I bought one back earlier this year and it worked out okay. For $30 it was "not bad"- not bad to put together and not bad looking. I bought a second one just so I can have a set, and this was a mistake. The holes are not drilled well, and because the hardware are cheap square-bits, none of my own tools would work to remove the screws to fix that issue. They just spin stupidlty. And some of the hardware is missing. I am sending this back. I will deal with having an odd man out in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: SweetDaesTop Contributor: My Little Pony

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 for my bedroom as I love the natural look. There was some parts you don’t need that I guess is just for how the item used to be made? Bc there’s a dowel to stop the drawer but the drawer naturally stops where it should. The screw plugs DO need to be glued down but everything else is perfect. The look, the color. All exactly what I Was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for nightstands. The first one I opened and the first screw I put in, the material stripped out of the hole. Had to send it back for another. I did get the new one quickly and was able to get both assembled. The quality isn't the greatest and assembly was more difficult than ir should have been. They do look nice once they're done.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Finish
customer_reviews.text: So I read the other reviews on here about the inconsistent finish and decided to take a gamble on ordering it because it didn't look too bad either way. I ended up with the cheaper version with the drawer front and lower shelf being made from particular board with a faux-grain facade. Would recommend, but the seller should definitely change the picture.
customer_reviews.author: GravyBaby

customer_reviews.title: too much particle board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the natural wood version.This product is a mixture of real wood and particle board. The real wood parts are the sides and the top. The bottom shelf, the drawer face, drawer sides and drawer bottom are particle board. The natural grain portions are gorgeous. The drawer doesn't sit flush against the frame and the particle board drawer sides cracked and split when I screwed into them. Unfortunately the bottom shelf is a structural element that provides shear stability so the fact that it's particle board is disappointing. I would have been happy to pay $10 more for that shelf to be real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Category Five

customer_reviews.title: Great piece. Wait for sale.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve needed a nightstand for my little boy’s room for awhile and just didn’t want to spend them money. I got this for $40 around Labor Day and it was worth it. We actually have a more expensive, handmade night stand that looks very similar that we paid $200 for and it’s extremely similar to this cheaper piece. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple bedside table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, natural wood bedside table. Serves the purpose nicely and looks good! The drawer is a bit shallow and one out of the two I put together, has a drawer that doesn’t fit perfectly. But with a little careful aligning, it slides in just fine. This bedside table is simply just what i was hoping for and is solid. It was easy to assemble and is intuitive—you don’t really need directions.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT high quality fine furniture. I would consider these like dorm room quality tables. But since they sit in the corner and one holds my computer monitor and the other hold my remote controls for TV operation..... these tables are perfect for our needs. They were easy to assemble. I am happy with my purchase and would purchase them again for our simple needs.
customer_reviews.author: D D.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for us!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my printer. It's perfect for that, the only thing the drawer is too small to hold much copy paper
customer_reviews.author: Janet K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get these end tables Very cheap ... missing screws, the screws given stripped out the wood/material so they won’t tighten at all. had To use different screws ... the handle won’t stay on the the screw provided Will have to use wood glue to make the table sturdy.. one of the end tables is wobbly and have to put something under the leg to make it stable
customer_reviews.author: Laura Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Simple and a good size for a nightstand. I love that it includes a small drawer for extra storage. My husband has had the same one for almost 10 years and it is still in good condition, so I decided to buy the same one. The only issue has been that the drawers are a little faulty. Almost like they don’t quite fit. I have a hard time getting it to close completely, but otherwise no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.  Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easiest assembly I've ever experienced. Everything fit! Couldn't believe it. First time after many items I've assembled. Nice wood, very functional and looks great. Good value. It was about 3.5" too high for an end table but easily cut it down.
customer_reviews.author: Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Cute small table
customer_reviews.text: Small cute table- fits great in a small corner and it’s good has a drawer and another pls e to put books or whatever you want. The drawer when opened all the way tilts down and seems that it would fall but it’s held by a piece of wood. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: VBC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve ordered. The quality just wasn’t there. The top had an extreme flaw in the wood that cannot be fixed. I had to cover this with a place at. It was too late to return. My first table was much better in quality and I had it for years. Also, the instructions are pictures abd not very easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my parents. They absolutely love it. It fits in the small space between the sofas. It is just the right size to hold a phone with an answering machine and an internet router . The drawer is perfect for the remote controls.. This table made a very nice present.
customer_reviews.author: shefox

customer_reviews.title: You WILL need to be handy!
customer_reviews.text: Original March 2019: Top was missing some finish. I had to redrill a screw hole. The drawer wouldn’t close until I sanded both sides in the back. And the drawer front is crooked. But for $39 it’s an ok table. My husband will spill coffee on it soon enough. UPDATE Oct 2019: Foolishly I bought another one and ran into the above problems and more. Sigh . . .
customer_reviews.author: B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Winsome Wood products before and have been pleased with their quality. However, I was disappointed with the quality of these end tables. The top and legs were solid wood, but the drawer (including the face) and bottom shelf were MDF. The drawer was also problematic when closing: The edges would get caught on the inner aspects of the table and would only close with much wiggling. Overall, the price reflects the quality: low cost, low quality. I'd rather spend slightly more on a better product. Also, $23 return fee (should have checked this out prior to ordering, I guess.)
customer_reviews.author: Cary E Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table for the money. Assembly was easy and straightforward. My only negative is the fit of the drawer. It fits quite loosely leaving a very noticeable gap along the top. A little re-engineering to allow for a tighter, neater fit would bring the rating up to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this nightstand. It's beautiful wood, sturdy, small enough for smaller spaces but more than enough room for side of the best type items. Holds lamp, phone, drink, charger, remote, moisturizer, all on the surface, then there's a very roomy drawer and bottom shelf. This would work as an end table in living room as well. I've used it for years and it's great, it was easy to put together, I'm a female that doesn't know tools and I did it myself. It's light if you want to move it around but very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: so it looks a little funny. I didn't expect a whole lot for $40
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured -- the drawer face and shelf are veneer rather than solid, which in itself is not a problem, but the veneer wood species and color doesn't match the rest of the table, so it looks a little funny. I didn't expect a whole lot for $40, but it's not as nice as the photo. I may return it (although that means the trouble of disassembly and packing it up). Otherwise, the directions were fine and it went together quickly and easily enough. If they hadn't cheaped out on those two parts, I'd have given it a 4-5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was going to return, but changed my mind
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two ... one for each side of the bed. When I first opened the box, the drawer front came out; and I felt it was way too light. I instituted a Return, but then I looked at the rest of the pieces and saw that their color was a little darker. Long story short, I changed my mind about returning them and put one stand together and think it looks very nice. I have one more to put together. I gave these four stars because I felt that the drawer could fit more flush with the front of the table, but it is not easily noticed since the top extends over the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive option. Coloring is good. Easy assembly instructions. The only problem was that on both of them, the holes were not drilled completely on the top piece and so I had to drill holes through.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this side table. It's very sturdy and easy to assemble. It arrived in perfect condition. It's a nice little table and the price is great when compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Hardwood but the table table is Plywood and chipped
customer_reviews.text: I’ve returned a lot lately from Amazon. This one is the manufacturer’s fault. This chip off the plywood top edge was found after unwrapping the protection insulation. Unreal it would be fairly packaged well but clearly missed QC.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey G.

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched Screws.  Unable to assemble, even by professionals.
customer_reviews.text: The screws, though they were all there, did not match the parts. The screws were too shallow to hold the parts together. I hired two different individuals to help me assemble furniture, as I was moving to a new apartment. Both individuals ran into the same problem with the mismatched screws. I tried to initiate a return, and Amazon would not pick up the item without charging me, which has never happened before. I have to take it to a Kohl’s, and I have a back injury.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedside table in height and size
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for a little corner next to my bed. I love the drawer for little things and the open shelf is more convenient than a door. It fits a little basket and all my electronics and chargers are within easy reach. After lots of time spent measuring and comparing, I’m very happy I found this. You can see how much I have on it. There is a slightly different color in the finish on the door front and the shelf from the top and legs but inthe corner where I have it it doesn’t bother me. It may be a concern for others.
customer_reviews.author: Mary in Long Island, NY

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little table at a fair price. As mentioned in other reviews, the drawer is a bit wonky but that fid not deter me from buying another one. It is very nice looking and the light wood brightens up the room which is trimmed in dark wood. I may be buying another one for another room. Would have given it 5 stars except for the wonky drawer. UPDATE: I now own 3 of these tables! We bought the third to put in our motor home for the living room area.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, and not just due to its low price!
customer_reviews.text: A great, inexpensive night stand. With a power screwdriver and the requisite bits--phillips #2 and 5/32" hex--it can be assembled in less than 15 minutes. I did have to use a 1/8" drill bit to widen the hole in the drawer knob, however. The existing hole diameter would not permit the mounting screw to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brasel

customer_reviews.title: You winsome, you lose some
customer_reviews.text: In this case, major win. We recently had new floors and wanted new end tables to match. I bought one just to be sure, and then bought the second one. They're easy to put together and hold my 17.3" Asus ROG laptop just fine when not in use. Like some other folks, it would be nice if the drawer was an inch or two deeper, so I could put my oversized headphones in there, but as it is I can put my mouse, pen paper, and random gadgets I want close at hand in there. UPDATE: Two years in, and these are still going strong. These are one of the best values on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: aPlateOfGrapes

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: They look nice once they are put together. We had to improvise with hardware we had in the house because the short screws were too short and the caps needed to be hammered or glued in. The wood cracked when putting the drawers together that needed to be fixed with wood glue.
customer_reviews.author: martha ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: just wanted a table to put a house phone on as well as some small decorative items. This is a nice table for the price and for what we wanted it for. Easy to put together and nice for small places
customer_reviews.author: mee nyny

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty end table for my sunporch
customer_reviews.text: Very cute table but did take longer to assemble. Plus I used my own screw driver. A friend helped me, and it took over an hour to put together. Many say less time. Some are better at these things, than others. All pieces were included Great price
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We basically love this little nightstand. The price was right it’s very solid and I love the color. The only thing about it I am not crazy about is that the guides that come pre-glued on the sides for the drawer we’re not put on straight so our drawer has a little dip on the left side of it leaving a little gap and looks like I might have to shim it if I want to be perfectly straight. The directions were really easy to follow to put it together. I think there’s some particleboard on it but it feels like solid wood for the most part. It’s very sturdy and pretty much exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen R. Hartigan

customer_reviews.title: Great end tables
customer_reviews.text: These are great end tables, I bought them to stand my computer on one and my laser printer on the other and they are sitting on either side of my desk doing a great job!
customer_reviews.author: PCDoc54

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price, with some caveats.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is better than expected. The fake veneer looks good. The fit tolerances were not great, but it assembled easily with 12 large screws to assemble the table and several smaller screws to assemble the drawer. The drawer bottom is flimsy particle board but appears to be strong enough. The drawer is very shallow. Note that the legs are thin in one dimension, and the table is a bit wobbly in one direction due to some flex. The veneer of the lower shelf did not match the rest of the table. Despite these limitations, I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. H Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking but needs some extra work
customer_reviews.text: The nightstand is sturdy and it is easy to assemble. However, the drawer glides are the one part of the nightstand that was already attached and I had to remove one side of this and make it level and adjust to the depth of the other side so the drawer would close properly. Since it was nailed and glued into place it was certainly not something they intended the customer to need to fix but I couldn't live with a crooked drawer and didn't want to return it after I spent an hour assembling it. Most of the dresser is solid wood and not particle board, with the exception of the drawer base. The color is true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good piece but assembly can be a challenge
customer_reviews.text: If you have power tools assembly is fine. Instructions and pieces easy to follow. If you have no tools at all it’s a two person job to assemble because the holes don’t line up well and are small. I needed a boyfriend and tools to get it put together. Otherwise it’s a good nightstand. Sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Looks Decent; Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 3 1/2 stars if the option was available. I bought 2 of these for my small guest bedroom because they weren't too large or too expensive. The quality is decent, but the bottom shelf does not match the rest of the wood; it is lighter. Also, the drawer flops down when pulled out. However, they look decent and fit well in the room. They are made well enough to hold up under light to medium use, which is all I need. Everything needed was in the package (except a Phillips screwdriver) and the instructions were easy to follow. Assembly was not at all complicated. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pamelapiep

customer_reviews.title: Fit And Finish Leave A Lot To Be Desired
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers have complained about the cardboard drawer bottom. I don't mind that. It seems strong enough. Others have complained about the finish. They have a point. I plan to sand parts of the table and reapply clear polyurethane sealant. What did bother me however, is that the drawer fit so poorly that it wouldn't close all the way. 15 minutes of work with an orbital sander cured that, but doesn't the manufacturer have ANY quality control? Pathetic even for an item made in Thailand. Having said that the table is reasonably sturdy, does what I wanted it to do and who knows maybe after it's refinished, it might not even look too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time to build or buy, stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look of the stand, but the tabletop is cracked in the center, none of the predrilled slots lined up and kept me from building the stand without glue... On top of that the stand that was not cracked had alignment issues as well and the drawers get stuck when you try to close them... I would return them but i am not confident i can get them back in the boxes to ship so i am out my money...
customer_reviews.author: Jbar2016

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it's what you would expect for a table of this price. If you are just putting your keys, phone, tv remotes or anything small like that, than it's nice. It's not the sturdiest table ever but its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The top came off
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. After I screwed it all together, I picked it up by the top, which came right off. The screws included to fix the top to the rest of the table are too short, and the same screws were too short secure the bracing under the shelf. Because the screws are too short, the table is wobbly and not secure. I imagine I could fix it up by buying my own, longer, screws. The ones the manufacturer included are not suited to it. It makes me think twice about buying another Winsome Wood product.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: This table is well worth the money. It was easy to assemble, fits perfectly next to my recliner. The drawer hides papers, notes, etc making them handy when needed
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: bought 2, returned 1
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these items and it was perfect. So I bought another one. It arrived with the top wood surface badly split and completely unusable. The paperwork with it included a form to request a replacement part, with a fax number. The fax number turned out to belong to a private citizen unrelated to the manufacturer. So I had to return the item to Amazon. Well, so that's a 50% success rate with this item. I probably will try a third time though, since Amazon's return policy makes it risk-free for me. But Amazon, you should hassle the seller for putting in an incorrect fax number on their replacement-part form!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beeson

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles
customer_reviews.text: I like the table it's very nice I have only put one together so far but one of my Allen bolts just keeps spinning around which is making the table flimsy
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth miller

customer_reviews.title: Not bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The only real issue I had with these tables was, there was quite a gap at the top of the drawer. They are heavy and sturdy for the size.
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Drawer difficulties
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, these are great if you need something that is cheap but looks sturdy. They are cute and I love them for the price but the drawers are sometimes hard to close. They aren't on a rail so they get stuck and don't close without some maneuvering.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For $40 this is a nice little table that looks good and feels sturdy. It's fairly small, but serves its purpose well. My only complaint is that the drawer is not on a track and while there is a peg to keep the drawer from falling out if you pull it all the way, it will hang down at a slight angle when extended. Also, if I just slide the drawer back, it often doesn't quite close all the way unless I "wiggle" it a little bit. These are just minor annoyances, because the bottom line is that it's sturdy, good looking and functional. Best of all it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: V. P. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to assemble. A few screw holes were slightly off but not bad enough to prevent it from going together. Quite sturdy. Looks very nice and is honestly a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: country

customer_reviews.title: A very tasteful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: A tasteful solid piece of furniture. Very satisfied. This is the third piece of furniture I have bought from this company always satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Russell C. Sernau

customer_reviews.title: Holes too big and screws won’t hole when putting together
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. I wish I could return or get my money back but I waited too long to put together. Well.. I couldn’t even put it together because the screws would not hold the pieces together. Not long enough and the holes were too big. Followed the instructions carefully because I actually thought I was putting it together wrong but, nope, it is just very poorly made. Right in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Randy Ostro

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! both are very light and easy for apartment living. It was so easy to assemble. I have two on either side of my bed and it looks very trendy
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Different colors!
customer_reviews.text: It is not as pictured! The drawer and bottom shelf, legs are different shades of a very light cream white! The top is lovely the knob matches the top and the sides. It looks like it was made from a mix and match pieces of wood and composite! Knew from ready reviews the drawer bottom was not wood but pretty disappointed in the mix and match colors!! My husband put it all together while I was not home. To much trouble to take it apart and send back. It is sturdy the top is nice and for that I did give it 3 stars but almost gave it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Honey BeeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, he put it together without any problems! It’s very sturdy, exactly how it’s described ! This nightstand should last for many years to come! Highly recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: JSD

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these end tables, ans they are perfect on either side of the bed, however they are not identical. One has white laminate inside one of the drawers and the other one has wood, while the bottom shelf on one is a different kind of with than the other. All in all, they look good and serve the purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: dawn tinsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Ikea
customer_reviews.text: The table is wobbly and feels cheap in construction. The drawers won't even close properly. If you put anything with weight on the table, feels like the whole thing would crumble. I would also not have this in a room with a kid just in case for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: D Sheng

customer_reviews.title: Weird Divergence in Color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these items at the same time, in the same color, and I got two stands in completely different colors, one light and one dark. The weird part is that I actually had two rooms and the colors were just fine. In the end, these are well made and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Altman

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, but poor quality drawer materials
customer_reviews.text: The table looks nice and is made in Thailand of a local hardwood pieces glued together. The legs are attached with screws and are reasonably sturdy (don't sit on it or place anything heavy on it). However, the drawer materials are made of sawdust compositon board and split when the attachment screws are inserted. The material also will not secure the screws well, as it it too soft. Therefore, I STRONGLY RECOMMEND glueing the components of the drawer together, or they will eventually fall apart. Due to the poor quality of materials in the drawer, I lowered the rating to 3-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Thule1

customer_reviews.title: Adopted as extra desk space and part-time, mini sewing machine table
customer_reviews.text: Actually got this to use as an extra desk surface and small drawer (I have a small desk that is wall-mounted, so I needed a drawer and more desk space), and this is perfect because it is lower than my desk height so it slides under the wall-mounted desk when not in use. Also, this is pretty sturdy and again a convenient height for certain crafts--I've even run my sewing machine on top of it (this was because my other sewing machine table is too high and gives me arm strain).
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: ... cost more than two of these and was total garbage. I then purchased these in natural and they ...
customer_reviews.text: The first night stand I bought cost more than two of these and was total garbage. I then purchased these in natural and they are great. Real wood, easy to put together (although it does take some time), and look nice. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This table fits perfectly in our small "den." In addition, it looks very nice, Love the drawers. This is the second one we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely wood
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a surprise for my husband to use in the evenings when he drinks his tea in bed. It's quite beautiful. It was hard to screw in some of the screws by hand. Decently sturdy and beautiful color. He enjoys it immensely.
customer_reviews.author: blondetabby

customer_reviews.title: Might have been a solid table but arrive damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this table, but it came partially assembled with two screws punching through the top of the table. Amazon recommended that I contact the manufacturer for a replacement part, but they wouldn't do that. Ended up returning the defective table and not ordering a replacement. Had it not been so sloppily packaged, it might have been a solid bedside table worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barry M. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: The table that I assembled does not look like the one shown on the web site
customer_reviews.text: The table that I assembled does not look like the one shown on the web site. The drawer panel and the bottom shelf are of whitish solid color, and the top shelf and the drawer knob have the color and pattern shown in the picture. Because of the two very different styles, the table looks cheap and ugly, with the drawer having a clown like face with the round darker-color knob on top of a white surface. But it was cheap and I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE - GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder surgery gave me a LOT of limitations - one was sleeping in a recliner chair - we got this little table to use as a nightstand to aid for the few months stuck sleeping in a chair! It is lovely for the price - does the job for having a 'nightstand' in our family room - great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for and I like it
customer_reviews.text: Is what I expected. The small problems are that most of the screws need the provided allen wrench tool. Kind of tough to do. The other issue is that the drawer front did not match very well with the rest of the wood. Overall, however, I got what I paid for and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: C. McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but a couple of issues
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. The shelves appear to be actual wood. There were just a couple of problems. 1. Some of the screw holes did not align properly. (Poor quality control at the factory)? 2. The drawer is of poor quality. It does not slide easily, and sits crooked. It is cheaply made Other than those two issues it is a decent piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L

customer_reviews.title: The tables are a perfect match to the bed we got
customer_reviews.text: The tables are a perfect match to the bed we got. The appear to be pretty sturdy. The drawers are a little weaker, but these are for a guest room, so it is fine. I gave 4 stars because the set up was a little difficult because the holes did not line up right. They were not so bad that it couldn't be worked in with a little strength. but enough that it made it longer to put together.
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a handsome nightstand; it has a smooth finish and a smooth-sliding drawer. The bottom shelf is sturdy also. It’s become my 18-lb dog’s fave place to curl up on.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira M

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The table is great and it is worth the money. I enjoy the sturdiness of the table and I recommend it for other's to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nightstand to match the Winsome Wood audio cart I already owned. The nightstand is low in price, good-looking, of good quality, and went together well. However, there were two small problems: I had to sand the bottom of the drawer because it was a little too large to fit the space for it and, more interestingly, I discovered that the stopper for the drawer has to be added after the drawer has been inserted. I had to sand down the stopper before I could get the drawer in. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Glorious

customer_reviews.title: Very good not great
customer_reviews.text: There are pros and cons to this nightstand. It is attractive, solid, not too difficult to put together. It doesn't scream expensive, and the legs are pretty plain, for lack of a better word. Nevertheless, I think it's an okay purchase, giving it 4 stars because there's no 3.5 option.
customer_reviews.author: andyoctober

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my printer & easy to pu together. 4 stars as holes for mobs too small so had to enlarge them & bottom of drawer was a little frustrating to keep in place
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: weight limit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little table. Took maybe 20 minutes to assemble (and I'm not good at these things). I have a large free standing room air conditioner sitting on it and there is absolutely no wobble. The AC probably weighs at least 60 lbs. I have bought Winsome Woods before and am always satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie G

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a nightstand in months! and to say its inconvenient is an understatement. So when I got the Winsome Wood End Table I was ecstatic! I put it together immediately anddddd the drawer didn't fit. Like really? I could barely get the drawer to close and am basically pretending it doesnt exist at this point. That could be contributed to my building skills but I'm usually pretty good about this kind of thing. If you are very savvy when it comes to building you will likely have no issues and love this end table. Otherwise beware! It doesnt put together cleanly :/ good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good material
customer_reviews.text: Made of cheap material. Broke right away. Screws Don’t go all the way.
customer_reviews.author: LL0922

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedside or small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to assemble. The material is good, very natural. The inside of the drawer is laminated for easy cleaning. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Winsome Wood Claire Accent Table, Natural
feature_bullets: Table stands at 18"W x 18"D x 22"H. Drawer has Inside Dimension of 12"W x 13. 75"D x 2. 3"H.
Shelf surface is 13. 3"W x 14. 8"D with shelf Clearance of 9. 3" From bottom of drawer.
Made with combination of solid and composite wood in Natural wood Finish. Assembly required.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
